value.title: Kadaxis
value.excerpt: We help publishers improve book discoverability on retailer search engines (like Amazon) leading to increased recurring revenue. We use the latest data science technology to find keywords for books, through reader audience analysis.
value.name: Kadaxis
value.overview: We help publishers improve book discoverability on retailer search engines (like Amazon) leading to increased recurring revenue. We use the latest data science technology to find keywords for books, through reader audience analysis.

value.title: Narrative
value.excerpt: Narrative is the company behind the Narrative Clip camera, a tiny camera and GPS that you clip on and wear. It’s an entirely new kind of digital camera with no controls. Instead, it automatically takes photos as you go. The Narrative app then seamlessly and effortlessly organizes them for you.
